sentence: He's come out in support of attorney Harriet Hageman, and he is anticipated to make the race a top priority, including by holding rallies in the Cowboy State.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Eleven interesting races to watch in 2022

sentence: I look forward to serving with Harriet for years to come.? House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy in his endorsement of Harriet Hageman against Trump's GOP bte noire, Rep. Liz Cheney.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: The Big Lie Is Turning Fringe Candidates Into MAGA Stars
